> <OLD - Talon>
>
> "Then we can try to contact him"said the femme"This might be our only
> chance"

<NEW>

There is a nod from LEO PRIME, clearly distrust on his face, not of
TALON or STRAIGHT SHOT but of the Predacons. "If we let Hydras knoew
too much of what we think then it may tip our hand and let him know
what we are after."

After stroking his chin thoughtfully with a crooked index finger for a
moment he nodded. "If you think you can contact Waspinator and find
out then do it." he said. "But be careful, the Predacons cannot not be
fully trusted to live to their side of the bargain."

LEO PRIME had read the report where it seemed that WASPINATOR and
STRAIGHT SHOT had formed some sort of friendship while in the field,
but he was not sure if that was fanciful thinking on her part or was
that somehting that was true. He wore a troubled look on his face
since this was not something that could be easily taken care of on the
field of war . . .  at least not yet.

(TAG)

Preston
